Name: solutions
Title: Solutions | AidIQ.com
Body:
What we do

Our Mission

AidIQ was founded in 2009 to build effective and sustainable information management solutions for organizations in the humanitarian, development, disaster and emergency management sectors.

We develop business processes and apply technology to support and transform the work of people who assist communities in times of crisis and facilitate change towards a livable, peaceful and sustainable life for everyone.
